title: Integrative Medicine
description: A collection of RAND research on the topic of Integrative Medicine
cleaned_text: Report [Including Complementary and Integrative Health Providers in the Public Health Pandemic Response](https://www.rand.org/pubs/research_reports/RRA1836-1.html) Complementary and integrative health providers, such as chiropractors and naturopathic doctors, have been an underutilized public health asset in the response to the COVID-19 pandemic. How can they be better integrated into future responses to public health emergencies?
